main.name: Sergei Vorobev
main.occupation: Full-Stack Web Developer & Django Developer & Python Developer & Backend Developer
main.bio: Versatile software developer with a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science and over 4 years of experience, specializing in Python-based development. Skilled in full-stack web development, data science, and machine learning, with a proven track record of building scalable, data-driven applications. Adept at problem-solving and eager to contribute technical expertise to dynamic teams
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details, get coached or anything else.

resume.skillmessage: I'm a software developer with a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science and over 4 years of experience, specializing in Python-based development. I excel in full-stack web development, data science, and machine learning, with a proven ability to build scalable, data-driven applications. My core programming languages include Python, SQL, and JavaScript, and I'm proficient in web frameworks and technologies like Django, Flask, FastAPI, React, REST, and GraphQL. I leverage machine learning tools such as Scikit-learn, TensorFlow, Keras, PyTorch, and Pandas, alongside data libraries like NumPy, Matplotlib, Seaborn, and Plotly to deliver impactful solutions. I'm experienced in database management and ETL processes with PostgreSQL, SQLite, and SQL/NoSQL systems, and I bring DevOps expertise with tools like Docker, Kubernetes, AWS, Google Cloud Functions, and CI/CD pipelines. My development workflow is enhanced by tools like Git, GitHub, GitLab, Jira, and Scrum, ensuring efficient project management and collaboration. I'm a proactive problem-solver, eager to contribute my technical skills to innovative, dynamic teams

work.title: Backend Developer (Full-time)
work.description1: • Built scalable RESTful APIs with Django, boosting performance and maintainability, while using FastAPI for high-performance endpoints, achieving up to 20% gains in response time.
work.description2: • Designed and developed full-stack web applications with seamless front-end and back-end integration, enhancing application functionality.
work.description3: • Built and deployed machine learning models for predictive analytics, improving data-driven decision-making processes.
work.description4: • Optimized Docker and CI/CD pipelines for efficient deployment and scalability.
work.description5: • Ensured API reliability through rigorous testing and secure endpoint design.
work.technologies1: • Django, Flask, FastAPI, React, REST, GraphQL
work.technologies2: • PostgreSQL, SQLite, SQLAlchemy, OpenAPI, Docker,Docker, Kubernetes
work.technologies3: • AWS (S3, EC2, Lambda), GCF, CI/CD, Git
work.technologies4: • Scikit-learn, TensorFlow, Keras, PyTorch, Pandas, NumPy, Matplotlib, Seaborn, Plotly

projects.category: The main purpose of the project(web application) informing the user about healthy eating, illustrating personal data with glucose levels, weight, BMI. In addition, the application prompts the user to review educational materials and take a quiz, as well as analyses the user's answers and makes a prediction about the risk of increasing blood glucose levels.

testimonials.text: Sergei Vorobev was instrumental in our real estate website project as a full-stack developer. His expertise in Django and React elevated the frontend, creating a user-friendly interface. While primarily focused on frontend tasks, Sergei seamlessly handled backend duties when needed, showcasing his versatility. His attention to detail and dedication to quality ensured a seamless and reliable platform. Sergei's proactive problem-solving and collaborative approach made him a valuable team member. I highly recommend Sergei for any future web development projects.

Sergei Vorobev has been an invaluable team member since July 1, 2022. His proactive problem-solving, effective communication, and technical expertise in Django, React, and backend development significantly enhance project success. His contributions to projects like "Uncia" and "Gero" demonstrate his capability to drive success. In summary, Sergei's positive traits and technical prowess make him a vital asset to our team.
That's a super work!  Best in the group! (About wireframe projects, where I presented Tic-tac-toe game and cinema mobile app, and also facebook clone)
